alert.note: Alert for Levy (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 1:01AM EDT until October 12 at 1:45AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Levy County in northern Florida... * Until 145 AM EDT. * At 101 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles south of Fowlers Bluff, or 22 miles south of Chiefland, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Williston, Chiefland, Bronson, Otter Creek, Williston Highlands, East Bronson, and Williston Municipal Airport. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into a small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EDT for northern Florida.
